forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 13 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West southwest wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As the early unease of dawn settles over Downtown San Francisco, a blanket of clouds ushers in a silver-grey hush, with whispers of a steady west-southwest wind. The mercury rests around a mild 54 degrees, offering a crisp anticipation for the unfolding day. By sunlit hours, the clouds will part to reveal a promise of blue, with temperatures rising to a cool 61. Gusts will playfully dance about the streets, teasing the fabric of your layered attire.

The marine layer lingers, hiding the more distant hills under its gauzy veil, though the Golden Gate Bridge may occasionally wink through the breaks. This ebb and flow of fog creates a quite picturesque scene, an ever-shifting landscape that invites quiet contemplation or a leisurely stroll through the quieter corners of the city. For those venturing out, a light jacket or cardigan will keep the chill at bay, while comfortable shoes will facilitate wandering through the hidden nooks and crannies of San Francisco’s storied streets. Taking a moment to enjoy a café at one of the local haunts or simply reveling in the gentle breeze can imbue the day with an understated charm, perfect for savoring the gentle rhythm of urban life.
